summary: User timeline_14 chronicles struggles with OCD and anxiety, showing gradual improvement with therapy.

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I have no reason to keep going I can't see a future for myself Managed to shower and eat breakfast. took my medication as prescribed Small steps are still steps forward. I'm worth the effort
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I can't do anything right Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I'm completely numb But I remembered my safety plan set healthy boundaries and texted my sponsor. I'm worth the effort
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. Nothing will ever get better I pushed everyone away But yesterday I finally talked to a friend about what I'm going through and scheduled an appointment. I acknowledge my progress
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I feel completely hopeless Back to square one. I gave up trying Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. reached out for help Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel so alone. I feel empty inside Nobody understands what I'm going through. I've been having suicidal thoughts Decided to join a support group. took my medication as prescribed Met some people who actually get it. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I want to give up on everything I gave up trying Started using the coping strategies from therapy. asked for support I'm trying to be patient with myself. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. I'm broken beyond repair I've been drinking to cope My partner has been incredibly supportive. used my DBT skills Learning to accept help and love. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I'm a burden to everyone Back to square one. I pushed everyone away Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Reaching out for support instead of giving up. Small steps are still progress
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. tried a new coping mechanism So proud of myself. I'm proud of myself for trying Almost slipped up. I'm broken beyond repair But I reached out for help instead. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: I push everyone away when I'm depressed. I can't do anything right I'm losing my mind Trying to communicate better with my partner. set healthy boundaries I apologized and explained what I'm going through. Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
